author: Special Correspondent
text:
The vehicle will showcase A.P. as an attractive investment destination.— Photo: Special Arrangement

Ahead of the 46th World Economic Forum annual meeting, a special bus to promote the State with ‘Make Andhra Pradesh your Business’ campaign has been travelling through the streets of Davos, Switzerland.

Building on the “tremendous success” at the CII Partnership Summit, the unique initiative will project Andhra Pradesh as an investment destination, according to a press release from the Chief Minister’s office here on Sunday.

It is the first time Andhra Pradesh has branded a bus in Davos to make it the State investors’ port of call, it said.

The special vehicle is making rounds in the city to attract investments for ‘Sunrise Andhra Pradesh.’

Chief Minister N. Chandrababu Naidu will be in Davos for three days to participate in the WEF annual summit and hold bilateral meetings with industrialists, businessmen and experts from various fields.
title: Special A.P. bus hits Davos streets
